radiographic_examinations.findings: Detected a mass with a diameter of 22 mm in the left adrenal gland.
Demonstrated high uptake by the left adrenal tumor, whereas the uptake in the right nontumorous adrenal was markedly suppressed.
Revealed uptake in the skull and ankle joints, as well as both femoral heads (more prominent on the left).
Showed an irregular low signal intensity of both femoral heads on T1- and T2-weighted images, typical of avascular necrosis.
